name: Medical Services
description: All Free for Eligible Patients - (Currently All Medical Services Are Provided On Tuesdays and Thursdays) Medical Services Available: - Mental Health Counseling - Psycho-social assessment and referral - Physical Therapy - Dermatology - Rheumatology - Diabetes Education - Immunizations: Flu shots, Hepatitis B, Tuberculosis, Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertussis, - Primary and On-going Care - Wellness / General Health Exams - Preventive Care - Prescription Assistance - Health Coaching & Health Education -
fullDescription: All Free for Eligible Patients - (Currently All Medical Services Are Provided On Tuesdays and Thursdays) Medical Services Available: - Mental Health Counseling - Psycho-social assessment and referral - Physical Therapy - Dermatology - Rheumatology - Diabetes Education - Immunizations: Flu shots, Hepatitis B, Tuberculosis, Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertussis, - Primary and On-going Care - Wellness / General Health Exams - Preventive Care - Prescription Assistance - Health Coaching & Health Education -
whatTheyOffer: All Free for Eligible Patients - (Currently All Medical Services Are Provided On Tuesdays and Thursdays) Medical Services Available: - Mental Health Counseling - Psycho-social assessment and referral - Physical Therapy - Dermatology - Rheumatology - Diabetes Education - Immunizations: Flu shots, Hepatitis B, Tuberculosis, Tetanus, Diphtheria, Pertussis, - Primary and On-going Care - Wellness / General Health Exams - Preventive Care - Prescription Assistance - Health Coaching & Health Education -
howToGetIt: Please call (415) 405-0222 to schedule an appointment. If you have a health concern, have not seen a doctor in a while, or you want primary care, preventative care, or wellness screenings, they will serve you as soon as possible.
